text: Bhala ko'i bada rata di'am ghari'am vica ate kri'ama (kharhe hona) di halata vica nimarata sahita (du'a) kara riha hove, praloka tom darada hove ate apane raba di rahimata abhilakhi hove. Akhom, ki janana vale ate na janana vale dovem baî€¼rasara ho sakade hana. Upadesa tam uhi grahina karade hana jihare budhi vale hana
